name: treasure
preObstacle: There is a coin ahead! Try to get it by shouting Mine!

name: mermaids
preObstacle: You can also rescue helpless mermaids from the pirates by saying 'Ahoy!'

name: sailors
preObstacle: Lots o' sailors get shipwrecked around here. Let's save 'em from Davy Jone's locker along the way by saying 'Ahoy, mateys!'
